==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Fariha:''' Hello. How can I help you?
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Fariha:''' I'm Mr. [[Nizam]]'s secretary. I'm responsible for taking minutes for him.
::'''Fariha:''' If you see Mr. Nizam scowling or sighing in frustration, please don't take it personally. That's just how he is.
::'''Fariha:''' Just make your request in advance and he'll make sure it gets taken care of.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Fariha:''' Take care, now.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Event Dialogue==
===Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Fariha:''' Hello. I'm Mr. Nizam's secretary. I'm responsible for taking minutes for him.
:'''Fariha:''' If you see Mr. Nizam sighing slightly more than usual, it's a normal occurrence.
:'''Fariha:''' There's always more to do whenever there's an event being held in the city.
:'''Fariha:''' We'll talk later. I still need to sort out which supplies need restocking.
{{Dialogue End}}
